item.title: Bay Area Beogram 8002: Trying Out the Restored Components
item.description:
Following the capacitor replacement from the last update, a test connector was added to make it easier to work with the scanning LDRs. The button control panel was removed from its circuit board, revealing a typical amount of dust accumulation, which was easily wiped away. The test connector was soldered on, and the button panel was reassembled. Another task involved cleaning and lubricating the tangential arm assembly. The drive spindle and nut were in good condition...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/bay-area-beogram-8002-trying-out-the-restored-components/
